apply.title: Apply to Join Bright Ears
apply.subtitle: Fill out the application below and we'll review it within 3-5 business days. We manually vet all artists to ensure quality for our clients.

benefits.title: Why Join Bright Ears?
benefits.item1Desc: Keep 100% of your booking fees. We make money from premium features, not your hard work.
benefits.item2Desc: Get booked by hotels, venues, and event organizers who value professional entertainment.
benefits.item3Desc: Manage your calendar, bookings, and client communications all in one place.
benefits.item4Desc: Be featured on our platform with professional SEO and social media promotion.

fields.phoneHelp: Thai mobile number (10 digits, starting with 06, 08, or 09)

hero.title: Transform Your Business Atmosphere
hero.subtitle: Professional background music curation for hotels, restaurants, retail stores, and offices in Thailand. Curated playlists tailored to your brand.
hero.trustMessage: ‚ú® Trusted by leading Bangkok businesses ‚Ä¢ Expert music supervision ‚Ä¢ Seamless setup

problemSolution.title: Stop Struggling with Generic Playlists
problemSolution.subtitle: Your business deserves better than random music. Let us create the perfect atmosphere.

problem1.title: Generic Playlists Don't Match Your Brand
problem1.description: Spotify's generic playlists don't reflect your unique business identity and values.

problem2.title: Repetitive Music Annoys Customers
problem2.description: Hearing the same songs repeatedly creates a poor experience and reduces dwell time.

problem3.title: Manual Playlist Management Wastes Time
problem3.description: Your staff spends valuable hours searching for and updating playlists instead of serving customers.

problem4.title: Licensing Compliance is Confusing
problem4.description: Using music commercially without proper licenses exposes you to legal risks and fines.

solution1.title: Brand-Aligned Music Selection
solution1.description: Expert curators create playlists that perfectly match your brand identity, atmosphere goals, and customer demographics.

solution2.title: Vast Library with Smart Rotation
solution2.description: Access to millions of tracks with intelligent rotation algorithms ensure customers never hear repetition.

solution3.title: Fully Managed Service
solution3.description: We handle everything - playlist creation, updates, seasonal changes - freeing your team to focus on business.

solution4.title: 100% Licensed & Compliant
solution4.description: All music fully licensed for commercial use in Thailand. We handle compliance so you don't have to worry.

tiers.title: Flexible Service Tiers
tiers.subtitle: From startups to enterprise chains, we have the perfect plan for your business

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get professional music curation in 4 simple steps

step1.title: 1. Consultation
step1.description: We learn about your brand, atmosphere goals, target customers, and business hours to understand your unique needs.

step2.title: 2. Curation
step2.description: Our expert music supervisors create custom playlists tailored to your brand identity and different times of day.

step3.title: 3. Delivery
step3.description: Access your curated music through your preferred platform - Spotify, Apple Music, or YouTube Music.

step4.title: 4. Management
step4.description: We continuously update your playlists with seasonal changes, new releases, and customer feedback.

benefit1.title: Enhance Brand Identity

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about BMAsia music curation service

q1.question: What makes BMAsia different from Spotify playlists?
q1.answer: While Spotify offers generic playlists, BMAsia provides expert-curated music specifically designed for your business type, brand identity, and customer demographics. We handle all commercial licensing, provide ongoing management, and create custom playlists that match different times of day and seasons.

q2.question: How does music licensing work?
q2.answer: All music through BMAsia is fully licensed for commercial use in Thailand. We handle all licensing compliance with performance rights organizations (PROs) so you don't have to worry about legal issues or fines. Standard streaming services like personal Spotify accounts are NOT licensed for commercial use.

q3.question: Can we request specific genres or artists?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We encourage you to share your music preferences, favorite genres, and artists to avoid. Our curators will incorporate your preferences while ensuring variety and maintaining the right atmosphere for your business.

q4.question: How often are playlists updated?
q4.answer: Starter plan: Monthly updates. Professional plan: Weekly updates. Enterprise plan: Real-time updates as needed. We also refresh playlists seasonally and add new releases that match your brand.

q5.question: What music streaming services do you support?
q5.answer: We support Spotify Business, Apple Music for Business, and YouTube Music Premium. We'll help you set up the right platform for your needs during onboarding.

q6.question: Can we have different music for different times of day?
q6.answer: Yes! This is one of our key features. We create different playlists for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and late hours to match customer energy levels and business flow.

q7.question: Is there a setup fee?
q7.answer: No setup fee! Your first month includes full onboarding, brand consultation, and initial playlist creation at no additional cost.

q8.question: Can we cancel anytime?
q8.answer: Yes, all plans are month-to-month with no long-term contracts. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice. We believe in earning your business every month.
